_header: All christian men I bid you come
_description: John Audelay, ‘De Misericordia Domini’ — thirty-three 8-line stanzas ending with ‘Nolo mortem peccatoris’

BodDou302.First Lines:
All cristyn men y bid ȝou cumȝe vnbeleuyd cum wyle
                    ȝe may…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…þat says to vs with so good chereNolo mortem
                    peccatoris
BodDou302.Editions:
Whiting,  Ella Keats,
                        ed.  
             John Audelay: The Poems.
EETS
         o.s. 184 (1931); repr. 1988: 123-33.
